definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Expert systems are another name for Classical AI.
sentences.chinese: 專家系統是古典人工智能的別稱。

sentences.english: The case -based reasoning is an important reasoning technology in AI field.
sentences.chinese: 基於事例推理是人工智能中的一種重要推理技術。

sentences.english: What do you think of artificial intelligence?
Fire Upon the Deep. Vernor Vinge. A god-like artificial intelligence from another universe threatens this universe.
sentences.chinese: 來自另一個宇宙的人工智能體威脅着這個宇宙。

sentences.english: Her research interest covers articial intelligence and pattern recognition.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究方向爲人工智能和模式識別。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, AI has a lot of promise on the Web.
sentences.chinese: 雖然如此，人工智能在互聯網上有一大堆的允諾。

sentences.english: AI will not call in allies during the early parts of a limited war.
sentences.chinese: 人工智能盟國不會在過程中調用有限戰爭初期部分。

sentences.english: The advancement of artificial intelligence is unarguably accelerating the studies of robots.
sentences.chinese: 人工智能的發展無疑加快了機器人研究的速度。

sentences.english: Rumor has it you were the one who outsmarted the artificial intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 有傳言說你是唯一一個比人工智能更聰明的人。

sentences.english: Is there another possible reason for all of the female computer voices?
sentences.chinese: 還有其他的原因來說明爲什麼人工智能都用女聲嗎？

sentences.english: Tickle Me Elmo is the ENIAC of fractional AI.
sentences.chinese: 搔癢娃娃就是分人工智能界的ENIAC始祖計算機。

sentences.english: Among them, we have been applied to the methods of artificial intelligence and mechanical study.
sentences.chinese: 其中，我們運用到了人工智能和機械學習的方法。

sentences.english: The university will receive a subsidy for research in artificial intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 那個大學將得到一筆人工智能研究的補助費。

sentences.english: “Right now, vision is a bottleneck for artificial intelligence,” Ma says.
sentences.chinese: “今天，視覺是人工智能的一個頸瓶”，馬毅說。

sentences.english: "Strong superhumanity " would be more than cranking up the clock speed on a human-equivalent mind.
sentences.chinese: 而強勢人工智能則要比僅僅加快時鐘速度要複雜得多。

sentences.english: In the context of the Web, AI means making intelligent machines.
sentences.chinese: 從網絡的意義上說，人工智能意味着製造智能機器。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3

definition: Kai-Fu Lee (1961-), Taiwanese computer scientist and IT executive, founding president of Google China 2005-2009
